name: critter
description: Enterprise grade unified automation framework supporting web, API and mobile testing via Playwright and WebDriverIO/Appium.

scripts.test:ui: cross-env TEST_ENVIRONMENT=dev npx playwright test tests/ui/specs
scripts.test:auto: cross-env TEST_ENVIRONMENT=dev npx playwright test tests/ui/specs/automationexercise.spec.ts
scripts.test:api: cross-env TEST_ENVIRONMENT=dev npx playwright test tests/api/specs
scripts.test:mobile: cross-env TEST_ENVIRONMENT=dev npx wdio run wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test: npm run test:ui && npm run test:api && npm run test:mobile
